description: Giles Ackerley is worried since his home was "absolutely destroyed" when the Laxey flooded last year.
title: Laxey flooding victim fears new wall gate could lead to further problems
title_page: Laxey flooding victim fears new wall gate could lead to further problems - BBC News
maintext: Work to replace the existing stone wall began at the end of October and it was announced last week that an access gate had been ordered and would be placed within the new steel-reinforced structure.
